predictions.text: Microsoft’s December 2025 Patch Tuesday will include at least one CVE noted as 'exploited in the wild.'
predictions.verification_criteria: Microsoft Security Update Guide release notes for December 2025 explicitly tag at least one CVE as 'Exploited: Yes' or equivalent 'exploited in the wild' wording.
monitoring_signals: CISA KEV additions the same day
Security vendor blogs (Sophos, Trend, Kaspersky) citing in-the-wild exploitation
predictions.rationale: Multiple recent Patch Tuesdays included zero-days; December often carries year-end bulletins.

predictions.text: OFAC will announce at least one Russia-related sanctions designation via a U.S. Treasury press release by 2025-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: A press release on home.treasury.gov adds at least one Russia-related designation to the SDN or related sanctions lists.
monitoring_signals: Treasury press room RSS for sanctions
Ukraine war escalations or major strikes
predictions.rationale: Regular cadence of Russia-related designations continues amid ongoing conflict.

predictions.text: The S&P 500 Index (SPX) will close at a new all-time high on at least one trading day by 2025-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Official SPX closing level exceeds the prior record closing high as tracked by S&P Dow Jones Indices or major market data providers.
predictions.rationale: Tech leadership remains strong; seasonal tailwinds and dovish expectations support new highs.

predictions.text: University of Michigan 5-year inflation expectations (preliminary) for December 2025 will print between 2.8% and 3.2%.
predictions.verification_criteria: The preliminary December 2025 Surveys of Consumers release shows 5–10 year inflation expectations within [2.8%, 3.2%].
predictions.rationale: Medium-term expectations have been anchored near 3% despite short-term volatility.

predictions.text: Seasonally adjusted U.S. Initial Jobless Claims will print at or above 240,000 in at least one Weekly Claims report released by 2025-12-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: Any DOL weekly report in December 2025 shows Initial Claims SA ≥ 240,000 for the latest available week.
predictions.rationale: Labor market is cooling at the margin; weekly volatility can lift prints.

predictions.text: The Swiss National Bank will leave its policy rate unchanged at its December 2025 monetary policy assessment.
predictions.verification_criteria: SNB press release states the policy rate is unchanged versus the prior setting.
monitoring_signals: CHF exchange rate vs EUR and USD
Global central bank bias into year-end
predictions.rationale: Inflation is subdued; SNB likely to stay patient into year-end.

predictions.text: COMEX Copper (HG) front-month futures will settle at or above $4.20 per pound on at least one trading day by 2025-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: CME Group settlement for the front-month HG contract is ≥ $4.20/lb on any trading day through 2025-12-31.
monitoring_signals: AI/data center power buildout metals demand
predictions.rationale: Tight supply and AI/electrification demand create upside tail risk in copper.

predictions.text: NOAA SWPC will issue at least one R2 (Moderate) Radio Blackout alert by 2025-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: An official SWPC alert or event log records at least one R2 (Moderate) event during the period.
predictions.rationale: Solar maximum conditions elevate the probability of moderate flares.

predictions.text: Cboe SKEW Index will close at or above 145.0 on at least one trading day by 2025-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Official Cboe SKEW daily close ≥ 145.0 on any trading day in December 2025.
monitoring_signals: Demand for downside SPX tail hedges
Earnings surprises and macro event risk
predictions.rationale: Tail-hedging can spike into year-end but has been subdued recently.

predictions.text: The UK will announce at least one Russia-related sanctions designation by 2025-12-31 via an official gov.uk press release (FCDO or HM Treasury/OFSI).
predictions.verification_criteria: A gov.uk press release adds at least one designation under the Russia sanctions regime to the UK Consolidated List.
predictions.rationale: The UK regularly aligns with allied Russia sanctions updates.

predictions.text: Adobe’s December 2025 security updates will include at least one CVE with CVSS v3.x Base Score ≥ 9.0.
predictions.verification_criteria: Adobe Security Bulletins (APSB) for December 2025 list at least one CVE rated Critical with CVSS v3.x Base Score ≥ 9.0.
monitoring_signals: Coordinated disclosures via ZDI and vendors
NVD CVE entries mapped to Adobe bulletins
predictions.rationale: Adobe frequently patches critical flaws across Acrobat/Reader and Creative Cloud apps.

predictions.text: The U.S. 30-Year Treasury yield (FRED: DGS30) will close at or below 4.25% on at least one trading day by 2025-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: FRED series DGS30 daily close ≤ 4.25% on any trading day through 2025-12-31.
predictions.rationale: Cooling inflation and soft growth impulses can pull the long end lower.

predictions.text: NYMEX Henry Hub Natural Gas front-month futures will settle at or above $3.50 per MMBtu on at least one trading day by 2025-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: CME Group official settlement for the prompt NG contract ≥ $3.50/MMBtu on any trading day through 2025-12-31.
predictions.rationale: Winter weather, LNG demand, and production shifts can briefly lift prompt prices.
